card.text: Harriet Augusta Newcomb presented the Old Town Hall to the town in 1882. The Building acted as a community center, holding various events.
By 1947 the building had fallen into disrepair.
The college bought the building in 1982 and used it as storage.
The building was sold in 1986, only to be bought back in 1990
Old Town Hall Bookstore opened in 1992.

Now, the Old Town Hall Bookstore is a convienient place for students to buy or rent their books for the semester, as well as buy anything else, ranging from school spirit apparel to toothbrushes to paper and pens.
